message:
SYSTEM: Presentacion_OEG24-04-2014.pdf: Página 21
Running example. Preliminary hypothesis & Research Questions 
21 
• 468 stations 
• 4.3 M users/day 
PH1.- Given a set of RDF data streams, it is possible to define an 
RDF interchange format that optimizes the space and time  for 
the data exchange and parsing. 
 
PH2.- Given an RDF streaming engine, and a set of SPARQL 
queries, a RDF interchange format can be tuned to offer better 
performance in data exchange among processing nodes and 
query resolution. 
 
RQ1.- Is HDT a good solution for these dynamic data?  
RQ2.- Which are the particularities of RDF data streams? 
RQ3.- Can an RDF interchange format be parallelizable for 
compression and decompression (parsing) 
NO
speaker: SYSTEM
